metadata.title: CVE-2022-37428 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: PowerDNS Recursor up to and including 4.5.9, 4.6.2 and 4.7.1, when protobuflogging is enabled, has Improper Cleanup upon a Thrown Exception, leadingto a denial of service (daemon crash) via a DNS query that leads to ananswer with specific properties.

criterions.comment: pdns-recursor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
